subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Race
lead_paragraph: Using a carbon copy of his tactics in the Tour of Flanders a week earlier, Fabian Cancellara attacked from afar Sunday and cruised to an easy victory in the Paris-Roubaix bicycle classic.
snippet: Using a carbon copy of his tactics in the Tour of Flanders a week earlier, Fabian Cancellara attacked from afar Sunday and cruised to an easy victory in the Paris-Roubaix bicycle classic.
